title: 16-year-old wounded in shooting in Gary
content:
Gary police were dispatched about 7:50 p.m. to the area of 49th Avenue and Georgia Street for a possible gunshot victim, Lt. Dawn Westerfield said.
The 16-year-old told police he was leaving a gas station when a man near a vehicle parked at a gas pump and another man walking toward the gas station from the south side of 49th Avenue began arguing.
